title: Letter Case, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal thread on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered on satin foundation, lace
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Ivory satin letter case embroidered with flowers in polychrome silks and metal threads, trimmed with metallic bobbin lace.
